beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.
Clear Jenkins data before each test run.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.
Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

parameters.name: config

beforeStages.name: Launch browser and open the Login Page.

steps.name: Login with credentials
Fetch and update Jenkins CSRF crumb token.

beforeStages.name: Navigate to the New Item Page.

beforeStages.name: Create new multibranch pipeline project with name "Multibranch_Pipeline_Project"

steps.name: Create new Multibranch Pipeline project: "'Multibranch_Pipeline_Project'"
Scroll to Branch Sources section
Wait for the element to be visible
Scroll to element
Click on "Add source" button
Assert that current "Add source" list is equal to the expected list
